paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This diagnostic criterion identified one patient with ATTRwt and five patients with ATTRm.

functional_data.summary: The study did not provide specific functional data for the TTR variants.

variants.segregation_data: The variants segregate with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study identified multiple TTR mutations but did not provide detailed functional data.
key_quotes: Heterogenous types of TTR mutations included Val50Gly (n = 1), Val50Met (n = 1), Gly73Glu (n = 1), Asp38Asn (n = 1), and Ala117Ser (n = 1).

Several of them were ATTR mutation carriers from family history (n = 13) such as Ala117Ser (n = 7), Val50Met (n = 3), Ser97Tyr (n = 2), and Asp38Asn (n = 1) by genetic analyses but without evidence of showing the burden of cardiac amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for TTR variants were extracted from the main text.
